description: Shawnallen is a sexy, good ole southern boy. But he has some financial issues and was unable to pay his half of the rent to his roomie, Zane. So Zane decided that Shawnallen's straight boy dick would be payment enough. Shawnallen had never been with a dude and was hesitant. It didn't take too long to convince him to let Zane suck his dick, after all, he had no money and rent had to be paid. Watch this straight boy get head from a gay dude and then plow him hard in his ass. Think he will pay rent this way from here on out.
title: Buddy Buddy
